message: I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. Fair deal?
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  Take it or let's see how much the money devalues in the next round.
I'm willing to go down to 60/40. This is the last offer I'll make before we both lose more money.
Alice, time is running out. I'm sticking to a higher split for myself, but I'm meeting you in the middle a little. 65/35 - take it before it shrinks even further!
